title: 'Groundhog Day' in Crypto as Bitcoin Again Plunges Following New Record
description: Bitcoin briefly rose above $70,000 Friday, but immediately tumbled to $67,000, repeating Tuesday's action.

title: BBC to Experiment With Generative AI, Starting With “Doctor Who”
description: The broadcaster has started using AI to generate marketing materials for the hit show, and is open to using it elsewhere.

title: Arbitrum DAO votes on $1M fund for Tornado Cash devs' legal defense
description:
The Arbitrum community is voting on a proposal to fund a “robust legal defense” for Tornado Cash developers Roman Storm and Alexey Pertsev.

The Arbitrum DAO is voting to fund the legal defense costs of Tornado Cash’s developers. If approved, the community would donate up to ​​600,000 ARB tokens in the first year, worth nearly $1.3 million at the time of writing. 

A proposal submitted on March 7 by pseudonymous delegate DK seeks to fund a “robust legal defense” for Roman Storm and Alexey Pertsev, the developers behind the crypto mixer Tornado Cash. In addition, the funds could be used for public relations and advocacy efforts promoting awareness around privacy-preserving technologies and legal burdens for developers.

The proposal sets three tiers for voting under different funding levels, ranging from 200,000 to 600,000 ARB. To date, more than 80% of the votes have been cast for the highest tier. The deadline for voting is March 14.

Read more

title: Innovative Accessibility Technology Trials Launched at Glasgow Airport
description: In a pioneering move towards enhancing accessibility in transportation hubs, the Connected Places Catapult has initiated a series of groundbreaking accessibility technology trials at Glasgow Airport in Scotland.  These trials, set to take place this month, mark a significant step forward in leveraging technology to create more inclusive environments for all passengers, including those with […]

title: Scientific Community Unveils Guidelines for Responsible AI Use in Protein Design
description: A consortium of over 90 esteemed researchers, including a Nobel laureate, has called for adopting safety and security standards in utilizing artificial intelligence (AI) for synthetic protein design. The initiative, unveiled at Winter RosettaCon 2024 in Boston, seeks to ensure the responsible development of AI-driven protein design technologies. title: BTC is Fulfilling An Elliot Wave Pattern From November 2022: Analyst

title: $900,000 Up for Grabs As New Guaranteed Income Program Announced in Major US County
description:
A new guaranteed basic income program is set to launch in the US, handing out $900,000 in no-strings-attached money to its participants. California’s Fresno County has selected Huron and the 93706 zip code, two communities that struggle with relatively high poverty rates, to participate in a program that will see its citizens receive $500 a […]
